PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05522023-06-09ECCC
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to list four specific geographic areas in Schedule 2, designate them as tailings impoundment areas and authorize their destruction for the purpose of depositing deleterious substances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0122 Publication Date: 2023-06-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to list four specific geographic areas in Schedule 2, designate them as tailings impoundment areas and authorize their destruction for the purpose of depositing deleterious substances.
